articles.description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new privacy feature: 'Protect IP Address in Calls' making it harder for bad actors to infer location & enabling an anonymity
articles.content: Meta-owned WhatsApp is officially rolling out a new privacy feature in its messaging service called "Protect IP Address in Calls" that masks users' IP addresses to other parties by relaying the calls… [+2210 chars]
